rule: Each description must include multiple paragraphs with line breaks.
input: A bustling city street at night.\nNeon lights illuminate the scene.
coverage: A vibrant urban street at night bustling with diverse pedestrians in stylish attire moving along sidewalks and crossing streets. Neon signs in vivid colors brightly illuminate the scene, casting dynamic reflections on wet asphalt. The setting is late evening under a clear sky, with directional lighting highlighting storefronts and lively billboards. Towering skyscrapers and busy storefronts form a detailed background, creating an energetic and lively atmosphere that captures the excitement and pulse of city nightlife.
validityText:
The input is a natural language description intended for creating AI-generated photo prompts, written in English. It comprises a single paragraph and contains fewer than 80 words.
